Text: Swarm: This unit is not destroyed upon taking damage.

Text: Swarm: This unit is not destroyed upon taking damage.

Text: All cards deployed this turn gain +1 {p} until the end of the turn.

Text: Draw a card.

Text: Target leader regains +2 {l}.

Text: Target unit gains +2 {p} until the end of this turn.

Text: Whenever target fortification takes damage this turn, it takes 1 additional damage.

Text: Reveal target reinforcement.

Text: This fortification regains +3 {l}.

Text: This fortification regains +1 {l}, and the next time it would take damage this turn, prevent 3 damage.

Text: Whenever this fortification would take damage this turn, prevent it unless your opponent discards 1 card.

Text: Return the first unit that arrives at this fortification to its recruitment rail; that unit cannot be redeployed this turn. If multiple units arrive at the same time, your opponent may choose which unit to return.

Text: Cards that attack this fortification this turn have -2 {p}.

Text: Trigger: Your opponent draws a card as the result of an order. Response: Draw a card.

Text: Trigger: A card is deployed. Response: That card is deployed to their recruitment rail's other lane.

Text: Disable target reinforcement until the end of your turn.

Text: Target leader gains +1 {h} until end of your next turn.

Text: If target card completes a successful attack this turn, recruit them to the same lane at the end of this turn.
Name: Repeat Offender

Text: This fortification cannot be reduced below 1 {l} this turn.

Text: Deal 1 damage to the first card that arrives at this fortification.  If multiple units arrive at the same time, your opponent may choose which card takes the damage.
Name: Caltrops

Text: When this fortification is attacked, you may choose to destroy a unit from an allied recruitment rail and prevent damage equal to that unit's {p}.

Text: Trigger: A leader deploys one or more units. Response: That leader cannot deploy or redeploy any additional units this turn.

Text: Trigger: A player discards one or more times to pay the {c} of a card. Response: That player must discard an additional card (if possible).

Text: All cards recruited this turn gain -1 {c}.

Text: Destroy target reinforcement.
Name: Seek and Destroy

Text: If this fortification is destroyed, you may choose to discard a card to recreate it with full {l}.

Text: Trigger: A player recruits one or more units. Response: That player cannot recruit any additional units this turn.

Text: Defenseless: This fortification cannot be targeted for attacks. Any leader or unit that shares a lane with this fortification can be targeted for attacks.

Text: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Text: Allied leaders in reserve that share a lane with this fortification cannot be targeted by the effects of your opponent's orders.

Text: Switch the position of two allied leaders in reserve. (Recruited units are not affected by a change in leader position.)

Text: Whenever a non-attribute card controlled by you or an ally attacks, it gains +1 {p} until the end of the turn.

Text: Once per Turn Order (0 {c}): Parent card gains any attribute or class name you choose until the end of the turn. Equip: Attach this card to another card. It remains attached until the parent card is destroyed.

Text: Cards recruited this turn may be recruited to any recruitment rail in any allied lane.

Text: Rejuvenate: Whenever an allied card is deployed to this fortification's lane, that card regains +2 {l}.

Text: The first time a card is deployed to this fortification's lane each turn, draw 1 card.

Text: Whenever you play a Spell card, you may choose to pay double its {c}. If you do, the card gains the Prismatic keyword. (Prismatic: This card's effects cannot be prevented or modified by another player.) Spellcaster, Rank 3: While this card is recruited, you may play a Spell card with Rank 3 or less. If you do, remove this card from the recruitment rail.

Text: Any card that arrives at this fortification is Translated. (Translated: Target card is moved across the nearest lane boundary to a reinforcement rail belonging to a fortification in another lane.)

Text: Trigger: An allied Spell card is played. Response: You may play a Spell card with equal or lesser Rank using the same Spellcaster.

The next time that fortification would be attacked, the attached melee card becomes the new target of the attack. If the attack does not destroy the attached melee card, return it to its original recruitment rail.

While this card is revealed in play, it is the only card that Persist counters must be removed from in the end phase. (This effect can be active regardless of whether or not the card has been activated this turn.)

Whenever a card attached to this fortification would gain a Persist counter, you may instead add that counter to this card.

Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it. Cards that attack this fortification have -1 {p}.

Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it. While this card is revealed in play, this fortification gains the Sanctum keyword. (This effect can be active regardless of whether or not the card has been activated this turn.) (Sanctum: Worship effects require 1 less Disciple to activate.)

Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it. While this card is revealed in play, the first order you play each turn gains -1 {c}.

Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it. While this card is revealed in play, the first card you recruit each turn gains -1 {c}.

Text: Persistence, 1: This card is not destroyed by activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter. In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it. Restore 2 {l} to all allied cards.

While this card is revealed in play, the first time your opponent discards to pay the {c} of a card each turn, they discard an additional card (if possible).

Text: Disciple: This card can be used to satisfy the Disciple requirement of another card's Worship effect while it shares a recruitment rail with that card. When this unit deploys through a revealed Persistence card, it gains +1 {p} until the end of the turn.

Text: Sanctum: Worship effects require 1 less Disciple to activate. When this card would be destroyed, it instead remains in play at 0 {l} and gains the Defenseless keyword.
